original_text: A man shall be satisfied with good by the fruit of his mouth: and the recompence of a man's hands shall be rendered unto him.
korean_text: 사람은 입의 열매로 말미암아 복록에 족하며 그 손이 행하는 대로 자기가 받느니라

sentences.original_text: A man shall be satisfied with good
by the fruit of his mouth
and the recompence of a man's hands
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 한 사람의 손에 대한 보상은
